public_description:
Project Manager/Senior Project Manager




We are looking for a Project Manager/Senior Project Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of power delivery, utility construction, and high voltage. They will also have a proven track record of success in managing complex projects. The primary responsibility of the Project Manager/Senior Project Manager will be to oversee the planning, execution, and completion of projects. They will be responsible for developing project schedules, budgets, and risk assessments. They will also be responsible for managing the project team and ensuring that all project deliverables are met on time and within budget.





The ideal candidate will have a Bachelor's degree in Engineering or a related field. They will also have a minimum of 5 years of experience in project management. The Project Manager/Senior Project Manager will be a member of our team and will be expected to work closely with other members of the team to ensure the successful completion of projects. They will also be expected to work independently and be able to make decisions under pressure.



 

This is a full-time position and the salary is commensurate with experience. The position is located in our office in Michigan.





If you are interested in this position, please see the link below.
